Text: Hafslund Energy Tradingpst I am doing a reconciliation on Hafslund Energy Trading for the period of November thru March other than December all months agree I placed an entry in to DMS to cover December EPMI is showing a net payable to Hafslund of the invoice from Hafslund shows EPMI owing for the period Rebecca Grace stated that a reconciliation of the scheduling sheets for December is being done and this difference may be a scheduling issue She also stated the reconciliation will be a long process and if I supplied the carp report showing deal detail that it may help Thanks Mark

Want to make sure people are aware Cc As of today the CARP I ran from Enpower does not contain May st delivery for Sierra Pacific Power and Nevada Power Company The st information was in the report on the th and has been removed since then Attached is the deals that were there as of the th Thanks Mark Original Message From Bolt Laurel Sent Wednesday May PM To Confer Mark Subject FW Original Message From Gang Lisa Sent Thursday April PM To Bolt Laurel Subject RE We are still having some problems Julie Sarnowski will be autoscheduling everyday from now on Please call Julie if you have any problems Her phone number is or you can email her Thanks Lisa Original Message From Bolt Laurel Sent Thursday April AM To Gang Lisa Subject Lisa Are you still having problems with Enpower It is essential that every day is scheduled in Enpower for us to report the correct MTM PL which we are doing on a daily basis Please let me know if there is anything I can do Laurel

RE Detail for Hafslundpst I have email Molly and as of yet no response Mark Original Message From Gang Lisa Sent Monday June PM To Confer Mark Subject RE Detail for Hafslund Thanks lisa Original Message From Confer Mark Sent Monday June AM To Smith Katina Gang Lisa Cc Grace Rebecca M Minnis Sabrina Subject RE Detail for Hafslund Lisa I will need to call Hafslund today and request their December detail Thanks Mark Original Message From Smith Katina Sent Friday June AM To Gang Lisa Cc Grace Rebecca M Minnis Sabrina Confer Mark Subject RE Detail for Hafslund Lisa Mark is the one that is taking care of that CP and he is not in todaySabrina Minnis is original coordinator and I asked if she had copies of the information for Hafslund and she replied that she gave it information to Mark Confer Ill leave him a note letting him know what you need The Hafslund issue that I was working with is dealing with the month of Jan Let me know if I could be of any more assistance to you KaTina Original Message From Gang Lisa Sent Friday June AM To Smith Katina Subject RE Detail for Hafslund Both for all of Dec and or any day that has discrepancy Thanks lisa Original Message From Smith Katina Sent Friday June AM To Gang Lisa Cc Grace Rebecca M Subject Detail for Hafslund Lisa DO you need the detail the Enron has for Hafslund or the detail from Hasfslund or Dec KaTina

RE Detail for Hafslund Cc Lisa I will need to call Hafslund today and request their December detail Thanks Mark Original Message From Smith Katina Sent Friday June AM To Gang Lisa Cc Grace Rebecca M Minnis Sabrina Confer Mark Subject RE Detail for Hafslund Lisa Mark is the one that is taking care of that CP and he is not in todaySabrina Minnis is original coordinator and I asked if she had copies of the information for Hafslund and she replied that she gave it information to Mark Confer Ill leave him a note letting him know what you need The Hafslund issue that I was working with is dealing with the month of Jan Let me know if I could be of any more assistance to you KaTina Original Message From Gang Lisa Sent Friday June AM To Smith Katina Subject RE Detail for Hafslund Both for all of Dec and or any day that has discrepancy Thanks lisa Original Message From Smith Katina Sent Friday June AM To Gang Lisa Cc Grace Rebecca M Subject Detail for Hafslund Lisa DO you need the detail the Enron has for Hafslund or the detail from Hasfslund or Dec KaTina

Resume For A Person I have Known For Over YearsSally I know your are very busy and I also know you are always looking for good people Attached is a copy of a Resume for a person I have worked for in the past I have forwarded it on to HR also Thanks Mark

EES Spreadsheet Update Cc Kate I am checking out EES February deals with Brocklyn Couch and problems were noted on two deals on the th on the nd EES was not agreeing to what we Enron Power has in Enpower Per Phil Platter our numbers are correct and the worksheet needs to be updated to reflect Enpower EES stated they will adjust their numbers once they get an updated sheet Thanks Mark

Cc Kate I am working with Brooklyn Couch with EES on the March power activity and she has a deal referring to the schedule received from you Deal we have peak off peak EES shows per the schedule I spoke with Virginia and we agreed that variances which are listed as part of the schedule I will forward to you All others will go in to DMS Please let me know what you find out Thanks Mark

EES Worksheet Question Cc Kate these deal we believe my just need to be updated on your schedule If you can please take a look and let me know Buy not on your schedule Sell not on your schedule Kate this one may not be part of the schedule What all goes on it Sell Price Per EES the schedule is at Buy mwh STHourly EES has this as a real time deal on Thanks Mark
Two More Questionsnsf Deal mws is this another curtailment Deal mws Brooklyn has your schedule showing priced at Thanks Mark

March EES Differencesnsf I will be out of the office on Friday attached is the spreadsheet of the differences noted so far between EES EPMI and where we are with them Since the GL needs to be booked by the end of the day Wednesday I am sending this file to everyone Please take a look and let me know if more information is needed Kate you asked about deal EES shows this deal on the th at a price of They do not see this deal on their real time sheets for the th Thanks Mark

Latest Variances EES vs EPMI Cc Kate I believe you can help us on all of these if you note any that I need to get with someone else on please let me know right away Tomorrow is the rd workday and we need to make our journal entries booking interco at the end of the day Thanks for all your help Brooklyn please look this file over and let me know right away if there is anything I missed or need to add

Re March EESEPMI Revisionsnsf Things are looking very good I verified that all the deals below that were autoscheduled came thru all look good from what I can see Brooklyn is still looking at the real time deals to verify if they received all updated ones The only deal that I see that their may be an issue on is where the peak hours are still at Any more information on this one Thanks Mark Kate Symes PM To Mark CT Brooklyn ES cc Subject March EESEPMI Revisions Ive attached the EES March Dailies spreadsheet It should reflect the latest volumes and hopefully will clear up some of the discrepancies were seeing between EES and EPMI Also Ive autoscheduled the following deals in an attempt to feed them through to the CARP report Please let me know if you see the changes come through Mark The autoscheduled deals are The last deal Im checking on is in your spreadsheet you said EES saw the on peak hours totalling MWH and believed the on peak hours should actually total MWH Below are the volumes I see both in the EnPower deal and in the March Dailies spreadsheet Maybe we need to autoschedule this one as well Please let me know how the CARP report looks now and call me with questions Hopefully this wraps it up for March Thanks Kate

Minor revisionsnsf Kate I looked over the list below and of them look easy just a few updates to the schedule or real time sheets and April activities will be well on the way Please let me know what you think If I can help from this end I will be glad to Thanks Mark Forwarded by Mark ConferHOUECT on PM To Mark CT cc Subject Minor revisions Mark See attached for updates Thanks bc PS I will be out of the office tomorrow

Hello Katensf Kate did you receive my email from the weekend for EES April activity I know you may not had time to look at them I just want to make sure the email got to you since it was the weekend when I forwarded it to you Thanks Mark
Latest Information On April EES Itemsnsf KateBrooklyn I looked over the latest file and attached my comments and what I see in the Carp as of yesterday Thanks

Can You Helpnsf Kate could you help us on deal that is showing up as a purchase from Enron Energy Marketing which Brooklyn dose not show any purchases This deal is Short Term California desk We also have a small variance with sales but Brooklyn and I still need to review Kate I looked for your email and can not find the one you sent me telling me what you look over Could you please resend it thanks
My Responses To Latest Variances Cc Look like many of these items will be cleared up with new sheets

Any Updatensf Kate what is the latest regarding Sierra Pacific Industries and the buy backs for the th th in the amount of for each day Let me know if I can obtain more information for you The payment terms are net days after receipt of invoice which they faxed to me on April th Again thanks for all your help regarding this and all the EES items Mark
